event.title: was established as a municipality on 1 January 1838

data.event: Vik was established as a municipality on 1 January 1838 (see formannskapsdistrikt).

event.title: 1 January 1964 the sub-parish of Kvamsøy (population: 363) was transferred

data.event: On 1 January 1964 the sub-parish of Kvamsøy (population: 363) was transferred from Vik to Balestrand Municipality and the sub-parish of Vangsnes (population: 189) was transferred from Balestrand to Vik.

event.title: 1 January 1992, the sub-parishes of Feios and Fresvik were transferred

data.event: On 1 January 1992, the sub-parishes of Feios and Fresvik were transferred from Leikanger Municipality to Vik Municipality.
